title: Friends list
body: Is anyone else's friendslist a little buggy? I've noticed every few hours that when someone logs off, it says they're still online, but they'll have no summoner picture next to their name on the list. Also, I have to click on "Show offline friends" twice to pretty much refresh the list. I hope this gets fixed soon.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is this still occurring? Have you tested to see if it happens when anyone on your friends list signs out or only certain people?

The only time I've seen this behaviour is if the person is using a client modification to appear offline, however it's possible the LoL Friends app may be causing the same issue.
No, I'm using neither of those applications. And it happens each time a friend logs out.

I was trying to imply that those friends may be, however if it's occurring when ANYONE logs out then that's odd.

It's possible it might just be a minor hiccup on your end, does it resolve itself if you restart your client?
Could you try a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).
